official_title: A resolution commending Amistad Promotions, Inc., for promoting understanding of the history and customs of Afro-Americans.

summary.text: Commends Amistad Promotions, Incorporated, and its supporters for their efforts in publicizing the history and achievements of the Afro-American people and strongly recommends public support for their efforts.

titles.title: A resolution commending Amistad Promotions, Inc., for promoting understanding of the history and customs of Afro-Americans.
